full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Janitorial Services for RCMP M Division Headquarters**

**Tender Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for Janitorial Services for RCMP M Division Headquarters.

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01013263

**Solicitation Number:** M8026-1-0323/A

**Publication Date:** November 10, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 20, 2022, 17:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Description:** The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide janitorial and snow clearing services for the M Division Headquarters, located in Whitehorse, Yukon. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supplies to maintain the cleanliness and safety of the facility.

**Contract Period:** The contract will be for a two-year period, with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement.

**Mandatory Site Visit:** A mandatory site visit is scheduled for November 17, 2022, at 9:00 AM Local Time. Bidders are required to attend the site visit and sign the Site Visit Attendance Sheet.

**Basis of Selection:** Bids will be assessed based on the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including technical and financial evaluation criteria. The evaluation team will determine if there are two or more bids with a valid Indigenous Business Certification, and if so, the evaluation process will be limited to those bids.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Patty Yi
* Title: Regional Manager, Procurement and Contracting
* Email: patty.yi@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Telephone: 236-334-9653

**Tender Documents:** The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.

**Indigenous Procurement:** This tender is conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. To be eligible, the bidder must provide a valid Indigenous Business Certification.
